backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a shop registry with CRUD operations (registerShop, getAllShops, getShopsByCategory, getShopsByCity, getShop), input validation, and in-memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (welcome screen, shop listings, shop detail, seller registration) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'APNI DUKAAN' and mounting the app at the #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with routes for welcome, shop listings, shop detail, registration, and success pages, wrapping inner routes in a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Shared page layout with a sticky header containing the logo and register link, a main content outlet, and a branded footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/ShopCard.tsx: Reusable card component that displays a shop's image/placeholder, name, category badge, city, and phone number, linking to the shop detail page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMultiStepForm.ts: Custom hook managing multi-step shop registration form state, including step navigation and form data updates for all shop fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all shops, a single shop, shops by category, and registering a new shop via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties along with brand utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationSuccessPa: Success page displayed after shop registration, showing the shop ID with a copy button and navigation options to browse shops or return home.
frontend/src/pages/SellerRegistrationPag: Multi-step seller registration form page with per-step validation that collects shop info, location, and details before submitting to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDetailPage.tsx: Shop detail page that fetches and displays a single shop's full information including contact actions (call/WhatsApp), location, hours, and description.
frontend/src/pages/ShopListingsPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable list of all shops fetched from the backend, showing shop cards with loading/error/empty states. Supports filtering by shop name/city text search and category dropdown.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing/welcome page showing the APNI DUKAAN logo, tagline, and two CTA buttons ('Find a Shop' and 'Register Your Shop') that navigate to the shops listing and registration pages respectively.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom brand colors (green/blue), fonts (Poppins, Inter), border radii, box shadows, and animations, using oklch CSS variables for theming.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 3) for the APNI DUKAAN app, documenting existing features, architectural notes, image requirements, and known issues for build planning.
